title: Twitter experimenting with new ‘Unmentioning’ feature, now available for some users
content:
A Twitter employee last year shared a preview of an unreleased feature to let users “unmention” themselves from a conversation. Now the company has finally confirmed that it has been working on a new “Unmentioning” feature, which is now available to some users.
